meanings.definition: To spray again with paint or another substance.
meanings.sent1: I will be respraying the walls to give them a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent2: The auto body shop is respraying the car to fix the scratches.
meanings.sent3: After respraying the fence, it looked brand new!
meanings.sent4: She resprayed her hair with glitter for the party.
meanings.sent5: The artist was respraying the canvas with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The act of spraying again with paint or another substance.
meanings.sent1: The respraying of the furniture took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: The respraying of the graffiti made the wall look clean again.
meanings.sent3: The respraying of the garden gnome made it look like new.
meanings.sent4: The respraying of the statue brought out its intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The respraying of the playground equipment made it safe for the children to play on.
